Text:
.....Fail...
Doesn't work on Windows Media Player, doesn't load on Quicktime Player, and is incomplete on Media Player Classic.
Otherwise? Great. Could use subs for Spanish parts, but no big.
V: 10/10

Subtitiles - non existant (miss half the film)
